title: And As It Is Such, So Also As Such Is It Unto You
description: Join Pastor Terry Veal and Father Marsala as they follow Jesus Christ and discuss scripture.
quote: And as it is such, so also as such is it unto you, young man.
altHero: a pastor and a priest sit on a talk show couch
alt1: the pastor and priest look at a guest
alt2: a young woman in conservative dress sits stoicly
alt3: G.O.B. Bluth sits and prays while the pastor and priest stand nearby
alt4: the pastor and priest chat while viewing a nearby tv
